component.name: AttrReader
component.script:
function init() m.top.functionName = "getcontent" end function
sub getcontent() content = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode") contentxml = createObject("roXMLElement") readInternet = createObject("roUrlTransfer")
readInternet.SetCertificatesFile("common:/certs/certificate.crt") readInternet.EnablePeerVerification(false)
readInternet.setUrl(m.top.contenturi) contentxml.parse(readInternet.GetToString()) if contentxml.getName()="Content"
parentNodes = contentxml.GetChildElements()
for each node in parentNodes itemcontent = content.createChild("ContentNode") itemcontent.setFields(node.getAttributes()) nodeChildren = node.GetChildElements() for each item in nodeChildren if item.getName() = "item" urlNodes = itemcontent.createChild("ContentNode") urlNodes.setFields(item.getAttributes()) end if end for end for end if m.top.content = content end sub
